name: Bitcoin Cash ETH PayPal Credit Cards Paywall
author: BA.net

sections.description:
Monetize anything! Accept Crypto and Credit Cards in minutes.
No Registration. 0% Fees. Non-Custodial.
Automate invoice codes, payment status and digital goods delivery.

Bitcoin Cash ETH, PayPal, Credit Cards Paywall WordPress Plugin
https://ba.net/bitcoin-pay-button

It will allow you to create BTC, BCH, ETH, Paypal and Credit Card payment links on the fly.
Including real-time usd price and qrcode

Pro version can also manage payment status and automatic product delivery.
Pro version details.

Lots of Features You’ll Love

BA Pay allows you to effortlessly control access to your digital goods
and paid content

  • Seamless integration with your existing website and CMS.
  • Your customers don’t need to register
  • Payments processed instantly
  • Can choose 0-conf, or default 1 confirmation
  • Non custodial, you receive the coins directly
  • You private key never touches the server
  • Open Source Code
  • Receive payments with 100% uptime
  • Easy single receiving address
  • PHP Self-Contained Plugin (apache generic)
  • WordPress compatible
  • Woocomerce compatible
  • Real-time crypto valuation
  • BCH, BTC and ETH supported
  • No middleman fees
  • Automatic order processing
  • Integrates CCs with PayPal button and QR maker

    • PRO WordPress Plugin

  • Automated Order Status and Delivery
  • Non custodial
  • Not dependent on any transaction server
  • Your customers don’t need to register
  • One time purchase $39.00
  • No recurring costs
  • No middleman fees
  • Supports BTC, ZEC, ETH, BCH
  • Integrates CCs with PayPal button and QR maker
  • WordPress or Generic PHP Plugin
  • Cloud Hosted also available

    • $39.00

    Buy Here

    Live Demo Examples

    Get pay buttons in seconds !
sections.installation:
To configure your payment address, support email
go to settings, plugin, bitcoin paywall

If you have any questions email us at iphone@ba.net
